}} 'React' (2008) is the third collaborative album by electronic musicians
Robert Rich and Ian Boddy. Like their previous collaborations [[Outpost (Robert
Rich and Ian Boddy album)|Outpost]] and [[Lithosphere (album)|Lithosphere]],
this album was released as a limited edition of 2000 copies.
